name: Monster Hunter Frontier G
overview: Monster Hunter: Frontier G is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) in the Monster Hunter franchise. The Wii U version was released in Japan December 11, 2013. Servers for the Wii U were separate from the PC, Xbox 360, and PS3 servers. Certain Wii U exclusives included Fire Emblem: Awakening themed Weapons and Armor.
